faqSection.title: Common Questions About Buying a House in Palam Vihar Gurugram
faqSection.description: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions regarding property prices connectivity legal aspects and amenities in this prime Gurugram locality.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range to buy house in Palam Vihar Gurugram
faqs.answer: The price range for houses in Palam Vihar varies significantly based on the plot size construction age and whether it is an independent villa or a builder floor unit. For smaller builder floors or 4 Marla constructions, prices might start from around INR 180 Cr to INR 250 Cr. Larger independent houses on plots of 8 Marla and above can easily range from INR 400 Cr upwards depending on the finish and location within the sector. It is important to consult current listings and recent sales data for the most accurate valuation reflecting today's market conditions.

faqs.question: Is Palam Vihar a safe residential area for families and children
faqs.answer: Palam Vihar is renowned for being one of the safest and most family-friendly neighborhoods in Gurugram. Many residential blocks operate as secure, gated communities with monitored access. Furthermore, the area has an active local policing presence and strong Resident Welfare Associations RWA that prioritize security and maintenance. The abundance of parks and quality schools nearby further solidifies its reputation as an ideal place for family living.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity from Palam Vihar to Delhi and the IGI Airport
faqs.answer: Connectivity is one of Palam Vihar's greatest strengths. It is closely connected to the main Palam Vihar Road which leads directly to Delhi. IGI Airport Terminal 3 is approximately a 20 to 30-minute drive depending on traffic largely facilitated by proximity to the Dwarka Expressway link and NH48. This excellent road network makes Palam Vihar extremely convenient for frequent flyers and those working in Delhi or Aerocity.

faqs.question: Are there any issues with water supply or electricity in Palam Vihar houses
faqs.answer: As an established sector managed by HUDA and subsequently Municipal Corporation of Gurugram MCG Palam Vihar enjoys much more stable civic amenities compared to newer areas. The water supply is generally reliable and most large houses and builder floors have robust water storage and backup systems. Electricity supply is also stable with many residential complexes offering power backup facilities to handle minor outages ensuring uninterrupted living.

faqs.question: What type of housing options are most popular in this locality
faqs.answer: The Palam Vihar market is dominated by two primary housing types. Firstly, independent houses or villas built on larger plots offering privacy and extensive space. Secondly, builder floors which are very popular among modern buyers due to their efficient design and relative affordability compared to entire independent houses. Both types are highly sought after illustrating the area’s wide appeal.

faqs.question: What are the nearest commercial and retail centers to Palam Vihar
faqs.answer: Palam Vihar has excellent access to both local markets and large commercial centers. It has its own vibrant local market catering to daily needs. For larger retail therapy and entertainment, Gurgaon's prominent malls like Ambience Mall and the key office complex Cyber Hub are easily reachable within a 15 to 20-minute drive making shopping dining and professional life highly accessible.

faqs.question: Are properties in Palam Vihar considered freehold or leasehold
faqs.answer: The majority of residential properties in Palam Vihar are sold on a freehold basis meaning the buyer owns the property and the land indefinitely. This is a significant factor in the area's popularity as freehold status provides the highest level of ownership security and simplifies future transactions or modifications to the property structure.

faqs.question: What regulatory checks should I perform before I buy house in Palam Vihar
faqs.answer: Before purchasing a house in Palam Vihar you must verify the approved building plan the conveyance deed and the current legal status of the plot. Ensure that the property is free from any encumbrances or outstanding loans. We strongly advise verifying the completion certificate and ensuring that the construction adheres to the permissible floor area ratio FAR guidelines set by the local authorities.

faqs.question: Can I renovate or construct a new house on an older plot in Palam Vihar
faqs.answer: Yes Palam Vihar is highly desirable for redevelopment. Many buyers purchase older houses for the prime plot value and then demolish and reconstruct a modern structure adhering to current building bylaws. Gurugram authorities permit reconstruction up to four floors plus stilt parking making it an attractive proposition for custom home builders and investors.
